void '''StopSound''' (int ''tid'', int ''channel'');
== Usage ==
Stops the sound currently playing on the specified channel for the actor with matching tid. This is similar to the [[A_StopSound]] [[action functions|action function]] except that the default channel is {{c|{{Const|CHAN_BODY}}}}. If tid is 0, this stops the sound currently playing by the activator of the script.
== Parameters ==
*''tid'': The [[TID|tid]] of the actor to stop its sound. *''channel'': The [[A_PlaySound#Sound_slots|channel]] on which the sound is to be stopped. Default is {{c|{{Const|CHAN_BODY}}}}.
